mapper.update: update t_dict set create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sort_order = #{sortOrder,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `type` = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, create_by, create_time, del_flag, update_by, update_time, description, sort_order, title, `type` from t_dict where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select id, create_by, create_time, del_flag, update_by, update_time, description, sort_order, title, `type` from t_dict
